value.title: Add Zoom Sliders on Axis in Power BI Visual
value.excerpt: Sometimes, there is a need to examine a smaller range of data in a chart without using any additional filters. Zoom sliders will help us a lot in those scenarios. During this video, we will learn how we can add Zoom sliders on Axis in Power BI. Zoom sliders give report creators and consumers an easy
